faq.title: Why choose MetaPress?
faq.subtitle: MetaPress is a comprehensive AI solution built specifically for newsrooms, automating the entire content production process — from topic discovery to publishing and distribution. This enables faster workflows, lower operational costs, and preservation of each newsroom’s unique journalistic identity.

faq.title: What makes MetaPress different?
faq.subtitle: Unlike traditional CMS systems that only manage content, MetaPress integrates deep AI into every stage of journalism — trend detection, fact-checking, automated writing, content diversification, and intelligent multi-channel distribution. It preserves each newsroom’s unique DNA while significantly reducing legal and factual risks.

faq.title: What’s special about MetaPress?
faq.subtitle:
A fully automated journalism workflow where every step is handled by a specialized AI Agent — ensuring speed, precision, and consistency.
Clear tone and topic boundaries preserve the newsroom’s unique identity.
Supports diverse content formats: articles, infographics, videos, and data-driven stories.

faq.title: How is MetaPress priced?
faq.subtitle: MetaPress pricing depends on newsroom size, number of users, and selected features. We provide flexible packages and detailed consultations to optimize both cost and performance for each client. Contact us to get a tailored quote for your newsroom.

faq.title: How can I start working with MetaPress?
faq.subtitle: The first step is to contact our consulting team to discuss your newsroom’s specific needs. We’ll then co-develop an AI integration roadmap, conduct pilot implementation, and train your staff. MetaPress will continuously support you to ensure optimal performance.
